verbs.description: In the whipsawing drama of the off - again , on - again U.S .- North Korea summit , the unpredictable main actors , President Trump and Kim Jong Un , [V: have] held center stage . But China ’s role is just as odd .

[ARGM-LOC: In the whipsawing drama of the off - again , on - again U.S .- North Korea summit] , [ARG0: the unpredictable main actors , President Trump and Kim Jong Un] , have [V: held] [ARG1: center stage] . But China ’s role is just as odd .

In the whipsawing drama of the off - again , on - again U.S .- North Korea summit , the unpredictable main actors , President Trump and Kim Jong Un , have held center stage . But [ARG1: China ’s role] [V: is] [ARG2: just as odd] .
